event_type.Description: Type of stimulus and task to be performed by the subject

Levels.Rotated_Audio: Auditory : scrambled sentence. Passive listening task
Levels.False_Font_Video: Visual : word in false font. Passive viewing tas
Levels.Audio_Computation: Auditory instruction for mental computation : ex: 'compute 18-3'
Levels.Video_Computation: Visual (text) instruction for mental computation : ex: 'compute 18-3'
